ygData.subject: Re: I have some possible bad news Disenchanting results with  Melody
ygData.msgSnippet: Steal Strength can be dispelled to, just use your target debuff song with yourself targeted. 1 pulse will remove steal strength. It s nice because you can sing
ygData.messageBody:
Steal Strength can be dispelled to, just use your target debuff song
with yourself targeted. 1 pulse will remove steal strength. It's nice
because you can sing it. This song is also extremely useful vs. druids
or mages. Get rooted or snared, maybe a DoT like creeping crud (little
dog barking icon), or even Tashani or Malise? all can easily be debuffed
off yourself. If you need to get rid of it faster you can pumice
yourself. I use the target debuff because you can use it on both
yourself and a monster, and the other only works on yourself only (and
party) and I believe requires the lute to be equipped to function (it
also strips 2 buffs though).

Ariell Thudnerwold, Karana


> I do not mean to raise an alarm especially on a song that was never
> particularly useful. However I just had been hit with a Steal
> Strength
> spell by a SK when passing through South Karana. I took the
> opportunity to
> test one of our more useless songs.. after 10 pulses it never managed
> to
> remove the spell. I ask our stronger kin to please test these results
> and
> make sure the song was not killed again.
>
> Adon
